item.description: ğŸŒ« Norilsk Nickel has published a new overview of the metal market. The global nickel market is projected to remain in surplus, exceeding 200,000 tons of nickel (Ni) in both 2025 and 2026. Meanwhile, the copper market is expected to shift back into a deficit by 2026. The future of palladium will largely hinge on the dynamics of investment activities in that year.

item.description: ğŸ” According to Euractiv, seven EU nations are now against the confiscation of Russian assets. Politico notes that Ukraine's aspirations for "reparations credit" from the frozen Russian assets are fading, as the European Commission has no alternative strategies in place. max

item.title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ Canada has released its Consumer Price Index (CPI) for November. On a month-over-month basis, the...
item.description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ Canada has released its Consumer Price Index (CPI) for November. On a month-over-month basis, the CPI increased by 0.1%, in line with expectations and a decrease from the previous month's rise of 0.2%. Year-over-year, the CPI is at 2.2%, slightly below the expected 2.3% and consistent with the previous reading. The core CPI remains unchanged at 2.9%, matching both forecasts and earlier data.

item.title: âš ï¸ Ukraine has rejected Witkoff's suggestion to pull back troops from Donbas during the discussions ...
item.description: âš ï¸ Ukraine has rejected Witkoff's suggestion to pull back troops from Donbas during the discussions in Berlin. The country maintains that a ceasefire can only be achieved without any prior territorial concessions to Russia, agreeing to a pullback only along the frontline. No concrete results from today's negotiations have been announced, and territorial matters continue to be contentious. Official statements regarding the outcomes of the talks are still pending. â€” AFP max

item.title: ğŸ’¥ In 2025, Mantle reached unprecedented milestones, reinforcing its network and market standing. The...
item.description: ğŸ’¥ In 2025, Mantle reached unprecedented milestones, reinforcing its network and market standing. The MNT token climbed into the top 30 on both CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko. The treasury exceeded $7.9 billion, boasting $2.2 billion in total value locked (TVL) and $750 million in circulating stablecoins. The community expanded to over 1 million members and partnered with more than 200 ecosystem collaborators. Mantle emerged as the largest ZK-rollup by TVL and was the first to incorporate EigenDA. Additionally, MNT was listed on major exchanges, including Coinbase. For the complete details, read the full report.
